text: That is the good news Allah has for His servants, those of them who believe and do the righteous deeds. Say, "For this (QurÂ´an,) I do not ask any compensation from you, except the kindness that kinship warrants." (Let) whoever earns good deeds (know that) We will increase the benefits (and the worth) of their good deeds. Of course, Allah is Forgiving; and He appreciates gratitude
